# ISmbiosOperations.GetSmbiosDataArray method

Gets a value containing the raw SMBIOS data.

```csharp
public byte[] GetSmbiosDataArray(ISmbiosConnectOptions options)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| options | Connection options for remote use |

## Return Value

The raw SMBIOS data.
